name: The Diligent Idle
description:
Playing idle games left you feeling bloodthirsty? Play ours to quench that thirst!

This game was created as part of Ludum Dare 41 game jam.

Controls:
Space bar / Left click to attack
Arrows / WSAD to move

Click icon or press [1]/[2] to build buildings
Blacksmith increases weapon damage over time
Residency increases gold income over time
